title: MAG 171 - The Gardener Transcript-converted
text:
Don't use me as an excuse. 
ARCHIVIST 
I-I'm not. I just… It didn't seem worth it. I didn't, hate him like I hated her. 
He never hurt me. 
MARTIN 
But all the people inside. 
ARCHIVIST 
Killing Nolan wouldn't have made it stop. It would just leave it… unsupervised. 
MARTIN 
Hmm. 
(Beat) 
(Sighs) John, we are, doing good, right? Making things better? 
ARCHIVIST 
I don't know if that was ever an option. 
[Tape clicks off] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme – Outro] 
JONATHAN SIMS

The Magnus Archives – MAG 171 – The Gardener 
22 
by Lowri Ann Davies, and directed by Alexander J Newall. It featured: 
Alexander J Newall as Martin Blackwood and Jared Hopworth, and Jonathan 
Sims as The Archivist. To subscribe, buy merchandise, or join our Patreon, visit
